resources.string: Scuba diving is the best activity to do in Kaş because it is the most beautiful diving location in Turkey. There are a lot of wrecks to see.
Antiphellos Ancient Theatre is a great place to watch the sunset in the evenings.

Meis is one of the Greek islands that are very close to seashores of Turkey. If you have your passport, it is a great option to spend a day or two. It only takes 1 hour to reach the island from Kaş with a fairy.
Paragliding is a great option for those who thinks diving is not adventures enough.
